docs.title: ADR 0000: This is ADR Template and Short Title of the Architectural Decision Goes Here
Context
docs.text: Describe the context and problem statement. What is the architectural challenge that needs to be addressed? Include any relevant constraints or requirements that influenced the decision.

docs.title: Decision
docs.text: State the architectural decision clearly and concisely. What specific approach, technology, pattern, or solution was chosen?

docs.title: Rationale
docs.text:
Explain the reasoning that led to this decision. Why was this particular option selected among the alternatives? Include relevant factors such as:

  • Technical considerations
  • Business requirements
  • Team capabilities
  • Time constraints
  • Cost implications

docs.title: Positive Implications
docs.text: List the benefits and positive outcomes expected from this decision.

docs.title: Concerns
docs.text: List potential challenges, risks, or negative consequences along with possible mitigation strategies.

docs.title: Alternatives
docs.text:
Describe other options that were considered and why they were not selected. For each alternative, briefly explain:

  • Key characteristics
  • Pros and cons relative to the chosen solution
  • Reasons for rejection

docs.title: Future Direction
docs.text: Outline any follow-up actions, future considerations, or potential changes that might be necessary as a result of this decision. Include potential triggers for revisiting this decision.

docs.title: References
docs.text:
List any relevant documents, articles, books, or other resources that supported this decision:

  • Links to relevant documentation
  • Research materials
  • Benchmarks or performance data
  • Team discussions or meeting notes

docs.title: Architecture Overview
docs.text: This document provides a high-level overview of architectural decisions made for the interposition-http-adapter project.

docs.title: Architecture Decision Records
docs.text: To be filled as architectural decisions are made.
